chunk_text: #### How many people can you accomodate? Choose between our Joinable Tour or Private Tour options. The Joinable Tour is a more economical choice and may include other small groups, while the Private Tour offers an exclusive experience just for your group. Please note that a minimum of 4 people is required for the Joinable Tour to proceed. #### Do you combine us with other people? Each tour lasts about 7 hours, with pick-up typically at 10:00 AM and drop-off around 5:00 PM.
